## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3c0fde8502cb19eb266cf53e69e92a54e426d6996f99eefd2c3ecefd5db7cc43)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'redux-saga-channel-end-rce' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
